## Data

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
wb <- 
  tibble::tribble(
     ~T, ~inf,
     10, 0.00,
    15, 0.14,
    20, 0.54,
    25, 0.75,
    30, 0.79,
    35, 0.00
    )


betawb <- nls(
  formula = inf ~ b1 * (T - 10)^b2 * (35 - T)^b3,
data = wb,
algorithm = "port")

```
